title: Flight Simulator 2020  - How to - Douglas DC6 - Fix livery update failures
description:
There are several people reporting issues after the latest update that the Pan American livery cannot be updated. In this how to we will discuss the steps how to fix this issue and update the Pan American livery to the latest version.
